A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really looked forward to this movie\, but ended up wanting to leave 40 minutes into watching it. Protagonists and villains (including those I was fond of in the previous films) were incredibly annoying and made uncharacteristic decisions that had completely avoidable consequences. Every minute there was another cringeworthy scene that was trying to be heartfelt. I literally had difficulty remaining seated due to how drawn out\, boring\, and stupid this movie was. I have watched every single Star Wars and animated Star Wars film and have played almost all of the games\, so I am a massive fan of this franchise. That being said\, because of this movie I will never watch another Star Wars film made by Disney again.
